author: Matt Purple
title: The Coronavirus’s Spread is the Federal Bureaucracy’s Failure
description: As a deadly pandemic made its way to American shores, our government was mummified in its own red tape. The post The Coronavirus’s Spread is the Federal Bureaucracy’s Failure appeared first on The American Conservative.
content:
As a deadly pandemic made its way to American shores, our government was mummified in its own red tape.The truth is always less glamorous than the perception. And the truth about 9/11 is that it was first and foremost a failure of bureaucracy.
